title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 186.1 - Armored car guard: definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 186.1 - Armored car guard: definition

State Regulations

An armored car guard is an individual employed by an
armored car carrier to provide armored car services and who carries a firearm
or is authorized by the employer to access a firearm when providing armored car
services. An armored car guard must be registered pursuant to article 8-C of
the General Business Law and these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19

186.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
